snippet.title: Super Silver Event Showcase | Sonic Forces: Speed Battle
snippet.description:
Super Silver is finally here! #sonicforces 
Special thanks to everyone at SEGA HARDlight for allowing me to showcase their new runner.
Be sure to turn on notifications to be alert for more videos. 🔔

Sponsored by Ekster Smart Wallets. If you make a purchase via this link, the discount code EK5 for 15% off will be automatically applied: https://ekster.com?sca_ref=425681.SUQKz1kmxx
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Super Silver Stat:
Speed: 6/10
Acceleration: 6/10 
Strength: 6/10

Items:
Whirlwind - Swirl your rivals in a cyclone and swipes rings as they rotate.
Super Form - Once you have accumulated enough Rings, you can change into the unstoppable Super Form and race down the track at tremendous speeds!
Tornado: Send your adversaries spinning with a gust of wind, and take whatever Rings they drop.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Download Sonic Forces Speed Battle here:
https://www.sega.com/games/sonic-forces-mobile
Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sega.sprint&hl=en_US&gl=US
App Store
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/sonic-forces-racing-battle/id1262362476
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
🎵 Music Used: ► Dreams of an Absolution Instrumental w/ Vocals - Sonic 06
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
♣️ Join this channel membership to get access to exclusive perks♣️
► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBd4qi2rqcVXzLSOQQYsEIg/join

📼Check out more from the playlist 📼
►  https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLsWw46i5BdzfLSIOz7an2Jn-9eECMJ3av

🍎Subscribe for more videos like this🍎
► https://goo.gl/2mJHzx

🐦 Follow Me on Twitter:
► https://twitter.com/AppleSauce2_0

🎮Join the SEGA Hardlight Discord🎮
 ► https://discord.com/invite/segahardlight
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
📱 Device Used:
► Apple IPad Air (4th Generation)
Release Date, October 2020
10.9 inches, 2360 x 1640 pixels 60htz Refresh Rate
Apple A14 Bionic Chip
64GB Storage, IPad OS 14.x

Subscribe to become part of the A-Squad

Key Text:
sonic forces mobile
sonic forces speed battle 
sonic forces speed battle super sonic
how to unlock get super silver
Sonic 06 
sonic forces music ost
